headline: Is Procter & Gamble (PG) Still Attractive After Recent Share Price Strength?
summary: Investors may be wondering whether Procter & Gamble is fairly priced at its current level, or if the stock still offers value for long term investors looking at quality consumer brands. The share price recently closed at US$165.28, with returns of 3.6% over the last 7 days, 10.1% over the last 30 days and 16.6% year to date. The 1 year return sits at a 1.6% decline and the 3 and 5 year returns are 29.7% and 51.3% respectively. Recent attention on Procter & Gamble has been shaped by ongoing...

headline: KXI Is Anchored by Dividend Kings That Quietly Returned 18% This Year
summary: KXI pays a 2.2% dividend yield by owning shares in the world’s most recognizable consumer staples companies, passing that income through to investors each quarter. With nearly 20 years of operating history and a portfolio built around household names, it has earned a reputation as a conservative income vehicle for retirees. But a 2.2% yield ... headline: 2 Reasons to Like PG and 1 to Stay Skeptical
summary: Procter & Gamble has followed the market’s trajectory closely, rising in tandem with the S&P 500 over the past six months. The stock has climbed by 5.9% to $165.39 per share while the index has gained 6.2%.

headline: Febreze Celebrates Fifth Annual Scent of the Year With New Tranquil Cyprus Coves
summary: CINCINNATI, February 25, 2026--Febreze is offering a way to embrace the escape to island life with the debut of its 2026 Scent of the Year, Tranquil Cyprus Coves. As the Brand’s much-anticipated fifth Scent of the Year, this fragrance encourages relaxation and embraces moments of self-care. Tranquil Cyprus Coves is part of the Premium Destinations Collection, enticing scent lovers to escape the everyday hustle and immerse themselves in nature's vibrant energy.

headline: P&G Sustainability Push And New Formats Underpin Valuation Case
summary: P&G (NYSE:PG) has rolled out Tide evo, a highly concentrated, waterless laundry detergent tile aimed at reducing packaging and water use. The company has also launched Head & Shoulders BARE Itchy Scalp Relief Serum, designed to provide scalp relief between washes. These product launches target consumers who are seeking convenience, effective performance, and products with a lower environmental footprint. P&G, trading at $165.28, sits in a familiar spot for many long term household product...
